text: I see villainy in your eyes.

name: drow_arc_intro_05
text: I'm the arbiter in this lawless land.

name: drow_arc_intro_06
text: A touch of evil is necessary to destroy even more.
text_simple: a touch of evil is necessary to destroy even more

text: There was only one end to this.

name: drow_arc_levelup_02
text: They started this, and I will end it.
text_simple: they started this and i will end it

name: drow_arc_levelup_04
text: I knew the tolls of the road when I started.
text_simple: i knew the tolls of the road when i started

name: drow_arc_levelup_06
text: Crime might not pay, but vengeance does.
text_simple: crime might not pay but vengeance does

name: drow_arc_levelup_07
text: See? Vengeance does make you feel better.
text_simple: see vengeance does make you feel better

name: drow_arc_levelup_08
text: The universe affirms my bloody path.
text_simple: the universe affirms my bloody path

name: drow_arc_levelup_09
text: What would it take to get me to stop? The impossible.
text_simple: what would it take to get me to stop the impossible

name: drow_arc_levelup_10
text: I've come far. But not far enough.
text_simple: ive come far but not far enough

name: drow_arc_levelup_14
text: I'll take it as a sign.
text_simple: ill take it as a sign

name: drow_arc_levelup_18
text: How many must die to set the world right?
text_simple: how many must die to set the world right

name: drow_arc_levelup_19
text: Let them all fall. And the forest reclaim the rest.
text_simple: let them all fall and the forest reclaim the rest

name: drow_arc_mono_a_02
text: Like the day my family died.
text_simple: like the day my family died

name: drow_arc_mono_a_03
text: All my life, that was lost in a blissful fog.
text_simple: all my life that was lost in a blissful fog

name: drow_arc_mono_a_04
text: But my time in the manic mask burned away that mist.
text_simple: but my time in the manic mask burned away that mist

name: drow_arc_mono_a_05
text: I remember the looks in those killers' eyes.
text_simple: i remember the looks in those killers eyes

name: drow_arc_mono_a_07
text: I see it when I close my own eyes.
text_simple: i see it when i close my own eyes

name: drow_arc_mono_a_08
text: But I also see my new path. Of vicarious retribution.
text_simple: but i also see my new path of vicarious retribution

name: drow_arc_mono_a_09
text: I won't be cruel. I will be merciless.
text_simple: i wont be cruel i will be merciless

name: drow_arc_mono_a_09_04
text: I won't be cruel. I will be merciless.
text_simple: i wont be cruel i will be merciless

name: drow_arc_mono_b_01
text: Most who claim the mad mask die soon after.
text_simple: most who claim the mad mask die soon after

name: drow_arc_mono_b_02
text: It stokes a mania that leads to violent death.
text_simple: it stokes a mania that leads to violent death

name: drow_arc_mono_b_03
text: A fighter cannot survive without regard to safety.
text_simple: a fighter cannot survive without regard to safety

name: drow_arc_mono_b_04
text: But for those who can resist the pull, there's power in that fervor.
text_simple: but for those who can resist the pull theres power in that fervor

name: drow_arc_mono_c_01
text: I resisted the influence of the mask. I freed myself from it.
text_simple: i resisted the influence of the mask i freed myself from it

name: drow_arc_mono_c_02
text: But I can't unsee the horrors it still shows me.
text_simple: but i cant unsee the horrors it still shows me

name: drow_arc_mono_c_04
text: A dark stain remains from its awful curse.
text_simple: a dark stain remains from its awful curse

name: drow_arc_mono_c_06
text: I fight to aim my bow only at those that deserve the worst.
text_simple: i fight to aim my bow only at those that deserve the worst

name: drow_arc_mono_d_01
text: My days of helping lost travelers are over.
text_simple: my days of helping lost travelers are over

name: drow_arc_mono_d_02
text: I don't trust myself around others anymore.
text_simple: i dont trust myself around others anymore

name: drow_arc_mono_e_01
text: This weapon is fit for a prince.
text_simple: this weapon is fit for a prince

name: drow_arc_mono_e_02
text: I like to remember how he squealed as he died.
text_simple: i like to remember how he squealed as he died

name: drow_arc_mono_e_03
text: He had it built to do harm, and his spirit need not worry.
text_simple: he had it built to do harm and his spirit need not worry

name: drow_arc_mono_e_05
text: And if I can help it, mostly to his twisted kind.
text_simple: and if i can help it mostly to his twisted kind

name: drow_arc_multishot_09
text: Doesn't matter if they see 'em coming if they can't get out of the way.
text_simple: doesnt matter if they see em coming if they cant get out of the way

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_02
text: An arrow for every bolt hole.
text_simple: an arrow for every bolt hole

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_03
text: Would have been hard to miss.
text_simple: would have been hard to miss

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_09
text: I knew which one would get you. The rest were just a ploy.
text_simple: i knew which one would get you the rest were just a ploy

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_10
text: I wasn't even aiming at you.
text_simple: i wasnt even aiming at you

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_11
text: What can I say? It just went off. A lot.
text_simple: what can i say it just went off a lot

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_12
text: I guess it was worth the quiver.
text_simple: i guess it was worth the quiver

name: drow_arc_multishot_kill_13
text: A quiver full of malice helps the enemy go down.
text_simple: a quiver full of malice helps the enemy go down

name: drow_arc_purch_02
text: What are you gonna do with all this gold anyway?
text_simple: what are you gonna do with all this gold anyway

name: drow_arc_purch_05
text: I might bring it back when I'm done.
text_simple: i might bring it back when im done

name: drow_arc_regen_02
text: At least I'll be sound of body.
text_simple: at least ill be sound of body

name: drow_arc_regen_03
text: Some things can never be reversed.
text_simple: some things can never be reversed

name: drow_arc_respawn_01
text: I won't tire before they break.
text_simple: i wont tire before they break

name: drow_arc_respawn_02
text: They'll have to kill me deader than that.
text_simple: theyll have to kill me deader than that

name: drow_arc_respawn_04
text: Add another name to my list.
text_simple: add another name to my list

name: drow_arc_respawn_06

text_simple: resupply and lets hit the road

name: drow_arc_respawn_06_02
text: Resupply and let's hit the trail.
text_simple: resupply and lets hit the trail

name: drow_arc_respawn_07
text: A nice respite from the visions.
text_simple: a nice respite from the visions

name: drow_arc_respawn_10
text: There's still time to recover. They haven't seen what I can do.
text_simple: theres still time to recover they havent seen what i can do

name: drow_arc_respawn_12
text: I have no problem taking that out on everyone.
text_simple: i have no problem taking that out on everyone

name: drow_arc_respawn_13
text: Is that the sound of fury in my veins?
text_simple: is that the sound of fury in my veins

text: I told you I'd find you.

text: I don't need to hurt you. Your death is enough.

text: You're nothing to me but a paid debt.
text_simple: youre nothing to me but a paid debt

name: drow_arc_revenge_08
text: I don't care about you in particular. I just have standards.
text_simple: i dont care about you in particular i just have standards

name: drow_arc_revenge_09
text: I've wasted enough time on you.
text_simple: ive wasted enough time on you

name: drow_arc_revenge_10
text: You started us along this path.
text_simple: you started us along this path

name: drow_arc_revenge_11
text: They might mourn you. If they find the body.
text_simple: they might mourn you if they find the body

name: drow_arc_revenge_12
text: Tell me: was it worth it?
text_simple: tell me was it worth it

name: drow_arc_revenge_13
text: I've been tracking you for awhile.
text_simple: ive been tracking you for awhile

name: drow_arc_revenge_14
text: This is what you signed on for.
text_simple: this is what you signed on for

name: drow_arc_revenge_15
text: The next time you kill me, make sure I stay down.
text_simple: the next time you kill me make sure i stay down

name: drow_arc_revenge_16
text: I barely remember your transgression. Only that you had to pay.
text_simple: i barely remember your transgression only that you had to pay

name: drow_arc_revenge_17
text: I don't even know your name.
text_simple: i dont even know your name

name: drow_arc_revenge_18
text: I want you to know that it was me.
text_simple: i want you to know that it was me

name: drow_arc_revenge_fail_13
text: I'll hunt you even after I've forgotten my own name.
text_simple: ill hunt you even after ive forgotten my own name
criteria: Custom Isdrowranger IsDrowMad IsRevengeFail Chance_75%|Custom Isdrowranger IsDrowMadLoadoutSpawn

name: drow_arc_revenge_flawless_04
text: No one would mourn me. But they wouldn't have to.
text_simple: no one would mourn me but they wouldnt have to

name: drow_arc_rival_001
text: I'm right at home in the mist.
text_simple: im right at home in the mist

name: drow_arc_rival_005
text: I may be uncaring, but your limits are too extreme.
text_simple: i may be uncaring but your limits are too extreme

name: drow_arc_rival_007
text: How many orphans have you made?
text_simple: how many orphans have you made

name: drow_arc_rival_011
text: I could never abide a mindless killer.
text_simple: i could never abide a mindless killer

name: drow_arc_rival_013
text: At least your nightmares were a change of pace.
text_simple: at least your nightmares were a change of pace

name: drow_arc_rival_015
text: You made a fun target. Shame you didn't last longer.
text_simple: you made a fun target shame you didnt last longer

name: drow_arc_rival_019
text: I don't mind using myself as bait.
text_simple: i dont mind using myself as bait

name: drow_arc_rival_021
text: Given your reputation, I thought you'd be more skilled.
text_simple: given your reputation i thought youd be more skilled

name: drow_arc_rival_023
text: A master of drink is master of nothing at all.
text_simple: a master of drink is master of nothing at all

name: drow_arc_rival_027
text: I hardly knew which part to shoot first.
text_simple: i hardly knew which part to shoot first

name: drow_arc_rival_029
text: How'd I find you? Stealth isn't your strongsuit.
text_simple: howd i find you stealth isnt your strongsuit

name: drow_arc_rival_031
text: I was almost of a mind to let you live.
text_simple: i was almost of a mind to let you live

name: drow_arc_rival_033
text: Add another Fold knight to my notches.
text_simple: add another fold knight to my notches

name: drow_arc_rival_035
text: I used to pity you, Clinkz. But I got over it.
text_simple: i used to pity you clinkz but i got over it

name: drow_arc_rival_037
text: If your armor were thick enough to stop my shot, you wouldn't be able to move.
text_simple: if your armor were thick enough to stop my shot you wouldnt be able to move

name: drow_arc_rival_039
text: There was a lot to like about you. But not quite enough.
text_simple: there was a lot to like about you but not quite enough

name: drow_arc_rival_041
text: Your strategies were tired, old man.
text_simple: your strategies were tired old man

name: drow_arc_rival_045
text: I don't mind shooting with the sun in my eye.
text_simple: i dont mind shooting with the sun in my eye

name: drow_arc_rival_047
text: Sorry, Dazzle. You'll be skipping the Nothl realm.
text_simple: sorry dazzle youll be skipping the nothl realm

name: drow_arc_rival_049
text: I didn't do this because you asked. I did it because I wanted to.
text_simple: i didnt do this because you asked i did it because i wanted to

name: drow_arc_rival_051
text: You should've learned how to blend in.
text_simple: you shouldve learned how to blend in

name: drow_arc_rival_053
text: Sorry to ruin your old school vibe. But I've got things to do.
text_simple: sorry to ruin your old school vibe but ive got things to do

name: drow_arc_rival_055
text: Wasn't sure if I had to kill you twice.
text_simple: wasnt sure if i had to kill you twice

name: drow_arc_rival_056
text: I've had enough of you do-gooders.
text_simple: ive had enough of you dogooders

name: drow_arc_rival_057
text: Well, that one's not going in the stew pot.
text_simple: well that ones not going in the stew pot

name: drow_arc_rival_059
text: Wonder if I can sell this one for meat.
text_simple: wonder if i can sell this one for meat

name: drow_arc_rival_061
text: You made the world, I'm a nobody. How'd I get the drop on you?
text_simple: you made the world im a nobody howd i get the drop on you

name: drow_arc_rival_063
text: You had enough mass, I could aim for center.
text_simple: you had enough mass i could aim for center

name: drow_arc_rival_065
text: Someone get me outta these woods.
text_simple: someone get me outta these woods

name: drow_arc_rival_069
text: Did you go back in time to stop me? Guess it didn't work.
text_simple: did you go back in time to stop me guess it didnt work

name: drow_arc_rival_071
text: That brush was happier as a tree.
text_simple: that brush was happier as a tree

name: drow_arc_rival_073
text: You were ruining the ambiance with that racket.
text_simple: you were ruining the ambiance with that racket

name: drow_arc_rival_077
text: A Nothl dog gets his due.
text_simple: a nothl dog gets his due

name: drow_arc_rival_079
text: Easy to see a target that brings its own light.
text_simple: easy to see a target that brings its own light

name: drow_arc_rival_085
text: I'd bet ice will get along just fine without you. And I couldn't care less about fire.
text_simple: id bet ice will get along just fine without you and i couldnt care less about fire

name: drow_arc_rival_087
text: Your own people didn't even care about you. Get over it.
text_simple: your own people didnt even care about you get over it

name: drow_arc_rival_089
text: That old man act won't work on me.
text_simple: that old man act wont work on me
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: drow_arc_rival_091
text: Is this where I make some gibe about your jib?
text_simple: is this where i make some gibe about your jib

name: drow_arc_rival_093
text: Why fight for Stonehall, Tresdin? Death is your only reward.
text_simple: why fight for stonehall tresdin death is your only reward

name: drow_arc_rival_095
text: I don't want this carcass. My guess it's real tough meat.
text_simple: i dont want this carcass my guess its real tough meat

name: drow_arc_rival_097
text: The path of the selfish leads to lots of arrows.
text_simple: the path of the selfish leads to lots of arrows

name: drow_arc_rival_099
text: I don't blame the mindless for their crimes. But that doesn't mean I offer mercy.
text_simple: i dont blame the mindless for their crimes but that doesnt mean i offer mercy

name: drow_arc_rival_101
text: Your entire life was a self burn.
text_simple: your entire life was a self burn

name: drow_arc_rival_103
text: You going to deny you had this coming?
text_simple: you going to deny you had this coming

name: drow_arc_rival_105
text: Wait a second. Was the bear just in my head?
text_simple: wait a second was the bear just in my head

name: drow_arc_rival_107
text: Consider this a mercy. Most would have tortured you first.
text_simple: consider this a mercy most would have tortured you first

name: drow_arc_rival_111
text: A measure of nobility can't erase what you've done.
text_simple: a measure of nobility cant erase what youve done

name: drow_arc_rival_113
text: I told you to stay out of the woods.
text_simple: i told you to stay out of the woods

name: drow_arc_rival_115
text: That's just for being tone deaf.
text_simple: thats just for being tone deaf

name: drow_arc_rival_117
text: Everyone steps on someone along the way.
text_simple: everyone steps on someone along the way

name: drow_arc_rival_119
text: Gambling debts were the least of your worries.
text_simple: gambling debts were the least of your worries

name: drow_arc_rival_121
text: Just a stepping stone to regicide.
text_simple: just a stepping stone to regicide

name: drow_arc_rival_122
text: I'll just wait here for your friends to be along.
text_simple: ill just wait here for your friends to be along

name: drow_arc_rival_127
text: Yes, I'm sure you were a big hit back home.
text_simple: yes im sure you were a big hit back home

name: drow_arc_rival_129
text: I told you to stop following me around.
text_simple: i told you to stop following me around

name: drow_arc_rival_131
text: They've all got it coming, but some a lot more than others.
text_simple: theyve all got it coming but some a lot more than others

name: drow_arc_rival_133
text: This one must have traded brains for teeth.
text_simple: this one must have traded brains for teeth

name: drow_arc_rival_135
text: There were enough voices in my head already without you.
text_simple: there were enough voices in my head already without you

name: drow_arc_rival_137
text: Even I still appreciate a double headshot.
text_simple: even i still appreciate a double headshot

name: drow_arc_rival_139
text: It's strange the Omniscience didn't protect you from all those arrows.
text_simple: its strange the omniscience didnt protect you from all those arrows

name: drow_arc_rival_143
text: Hard to say what you were guilty of, but I trusted it was something.
text_simple: hard to say what you were guilty of but i trusted it was something

name: drow_arc_rival_145
text: Pity the orphans I make today.
text_simple: pity the orphans i make today

name: drow_arc_rival_147
text: I bring your tortured existence to an anti-climactic end.
text_simple: i bring your tortured existence to an anticlimactic end

name: drow_arc_rival_149
text: Strip an enemy of their strength and victory is guaranteed.
text_simple: strip an enemy of their strength and victory is guaranteed

name: drow_arc_rival_151
text: That one fit the definition of monster to me.
text_simple: that one fit the definition of monster to me

name: drow_arc_rival_153
text: Trust me, that one was on someone's list.
text_simple: trust me that one was on someones list

name: drow_arc_rival_155
text: I wasn't sure I had enough arrows.
text_simple: i wasnt sure i had enough arrows

name: drow_arc_rival_157
text: You're proof of the ills, Pugna. A just world wouldn't contain the likes of you.
text_simple: youre proof of the ills pugna a just world wouldnt contain the likes of you

name: drow_arc_rival_159
text: Holiday's over, Akasha. Topside's closed for play.
text_simple: holidays over akasha topsides closed for play

name: drow_arc_rival_161
text: Know your place, revenant. I'm not in the Narrow Maze yet.
text_simple: know your place revenant im not in the narrow maze yet

name: drow_arc_rival_163
text: The Drow taught me never to rely solely upon my eyes.
text_simple: the drow taught me never to rely solely upon my eyes

name: drow_arc_rival_165
text: If this is all a game to you, let's say playtime's over.
text_simple: if this is all a game to you lets say playtimes over

name: drow_arc_rival_167
text: Why did you ever care about this fight?
text_simple: why did you ever care about this fight

name: drow_arc_rival_171
text: I always thought you were a bit puffed up.
text_simple: i always thought you were a bit puffed up

name: drow_arc_rival_173
text: We don't scare as easy as hill folk around here.
text_simple: we dont scare as easy as hill folk around here

name: drow_arc_rival_175
text: The quiet forest will feast on your bones.
text_simple: the quiet forest will feast on your bones

name: drow_arc_rival_177
text: He was way too tempting. Couldn't help but wing him.
text_simple: he was way too tempting couldnt help but wing him

name: drow_arc_rival_179
text: That blob fish held his breath for a really long time.
text_simple: that blob fish held his breath for a really long time

name: drow_arc_rival_183
text: The suffering you unleashed sadly won't end with you.
text_simple: the suffering you unleashed sadly wont end with you

name: drow_arc_rival_185
text: It was cruel to even give you a chance.
text_simple: it was cruel to even give you a chance

name: drow_arc_rival_187
text: I will say... She had a strangely enchanting voice.
text_simple: i will say she had a strangely enchanting voice

name: drow_arc_rival_189
text: Does your so-called master even remember you exist?
text_simple: does your socalled master even remember you exist

name: drow_arc_rival_191
text: You were more of a gust than a storm...
text_simple: you were more of a gust than a storm

name: drow_arc_rival_193
text: And that's what happens when I keep my distance.
text_simple: and thats what happens when i keep my distance

name: drow_arc_rival_195
text: I almost sully myself just by acknowledging your demise.
text_simple: i almost sully myself just by acknowledging your demise

name: drow_arc_rival_196
text: I'll just collect my arrows and move on.
text_simple: ill just collect my arrows and move on

name: drow_arc_rival_197
text: I've learned a secret or two in my time too.
text_simple: ive learned a secret or two in my time too

name: drow_arc_rival_199
text: Hell-kind must be lacking to be afraid of the likes of you.
text_simple: hellkind must be lacking to be afraid of the likes of you

name: drow_arc_rival_201
text: These are dry lands, Tidehunter. Maelrawn holds no sway here.
text_simple: these are dry lands tidehunter maelrawn holds no sway here

name: drow_arc_rival_203
text: Unchecked fear always leads to a bad end.
text_simple: unchecked fear always leads to a bad end

name: drow_arc_rival_205
text: Such casual cruelty in your hubris, Tinker.
text_simple: such casual cruelty in your hubris tinker

name: drow_arc_rival_207
text: If the hills have eyes, easy to know where to shoot 'em.
text_simple: if the hills have eyes easy to know where to shoot em

name: drow_arc_rival_209
text: Your kind could have intervened more in the troubles of others.
text_simple: your kind could have intervened more in the troubles of others

name: drow_arc_rival_211
text: I don't need to know you well to know that was for the best.
text_simple: i dont need to know you well to know that was for the best

name: drow_arc_rival_213
text: When ego drives you, others are bound to get hurt.
text_simple: when ego drives you others are bound to get hurt

name: drow_arc_rival_215
text: It's not hard to justify this kill.
text_simple: its not hard to justify this kill

name: drow_arc_rival_217
text: No questions asked outside of Quoidge.
text_simple: no questions asked outside of quoidge

name: drow_arc_rival_219
text: I'm no different than a natural death. Just a faster timeline.
text_simple: im no different than a natural death just a faster timeline

name: drow_arc_rival_221
text: Your quest was selfish. But I'll take vengeance on and for everyone.
text_simple: your quest was selfish but ill take vengeance on and for everyone

name: drow_arc_rival_222
text: I'll dispose of your sister for you. And anyone else I please.
text_simple: ill dispose of your sister for you and anyone else i please

name: drow_arc_rival_223
text: Was it just me or could that slug talk?
text_simple: was it just me or could that slug talk

name: drow_arc_rival_225
text: I should have read up on whatever that thing was. Because that hurt.
text_simple: i should have read up on whatever that thing was because that hurt

name: drow_arc_rival_227
text: Who watches the watchers, then? I guess me.
text_simple: who watches the watchers then i guess me

name: drow_arc_rival_229
text: I thought you were just a rumor. Now you're just a memory.
text_simple: i thought you were just a rumor now youre just a memory

name: drow_arc_rival_231
text: Did the map you used to get here also mark your own grave?
text_simple: did the map you used to get here also mark your own grave

name: drow_arc_rival_233
text: If I don't think of a good pun now, it'll bug me later.
text_simple: if i dont think of a good pun now itll bug me later

name: drow_arc_rival_235
text: I'd hardly call what you do rangering.
text_simple: id hardly call what you do rangering

name: drow_arc_rival_236
text: About the level of competition I expected.
text_simple: about the level of competition i expected

name: drow_arc_rival_237
text: Worry not, Wyvern. I'll lay claim to your library.
text_simple: worry not wyvern ill lay claim to your library

name: drow_arc_rival_239
text: If that one had a people, they must have kicked him out.
text_simple: if that one had a people they must have kicked him out

name: drow_arc_rival_241
text: You don't get a second chance.
text_simple: you dont get a second chance

name: drow_arc_rival_243
text: What did you do to deserve this? Zeus, who has that kind of time?
text_simple: what did you do to deserve this zeus who has that kind of time

name: drow_arc_rival_302
text: You were so much nicer on your leash.
text_simple: you were so much nicer on your leash

name: drow_arc_rival_303
text: That's one hell of a death rattle.
text_simple: thats one hell of a death rattle

name: drow_arc_spawn_01
text: I like to be honest. You're all going to die.
text_simple: i like to be honest youre all going to die

name: drow_arc_spawn_02
text: The weak can save themselves. I come for retribution.
text_simple: the weak can save themselves i come for retribution

name: drow_arc_spawn_03
text: Hunting rogues helps keep the pain at bay.
text_simple: hunting rogues helps keep the pain at bay

name: drow_arc_spawn_04
text: We'll get ourselves situated and then the rest will suffer.
text_simple: well get ourselves situated and then the rest will suffer

name: drow_arc_spawn_05
text: I'm going to savor every minute.
text_simple: im going to savor every minute

name: drow_arc_spawn_06
text: This world is filled with suffering. Why not add a little more?
text_simple: this world is filled with suffering why not add a little more

name: drow_arc_spawn_07
text: Where once they shared tales about me, now they'll give warning.
text_simple: where once they shared tales about me now theyll give warning

name: drow_arc_spawn_08
text: Fear the whisper of my footfall, for it means you're already dead.
text_simple: fear the whisper of my footfall for it means youre already dead

name: drow_arc_spawn_09
text: I was always cold. And now I'm angry.
text_simple: i was always cold and now im angry

name: drow_arc_spawn_10
text: Why should I give you my name?
text_simple: why should i give you my name

name: drow_arc_spawn_11
text: We just need to get along. We don't need to be friends.
text_simple: we just need to get along we dont need to be friends

name: drow_arc_spawn_12
text: I might tell you my name. If you survive.
text_simple: i might tell you my name if you survive

name: drow_arc_spawn_13
text: Kill an Ancient? All right, I'm convinced.
text_simple: kill an ancient all right im convinced

name: drow_arc_spawn_14
text: I'm just here for some violence along the way.
text_simple: im just here for some violence along the way

name: drow_arc_spawn_15
text: Leave me to my business and we might win this thing.
text_simple: leave me to my business and we might win this thing

name: drow_arc_spawn_16
text: There's no I in team, but it does contain me. For now.
text_simple: theres no i in team but it does contain me for now

name: drow_arc_spawn_17
text: This four might have a chance.
text_simple: this four might have a chance

name: drow_arc_spawn_18
text: I used to ignore people. But they make decent sport.
text_simple: i used to ignore people but they make decent sport

name: drow_arc_taunt_02
text: How can I consider you a real threat?
text_simple: how can i consider you a real threat

name: drow_arc_taunt_03
text: No wonder you're on the other team.
text_simple: no wonder youre on the other team

name: drow_arc_thanks_02
text: I wasn't expecting you to be useful.
text_simple: i wasnt expecting you to be useful

name: drow_arc_thanks_03
text: I trust my gratitude is enough.
text_simple: i trust my gratitude is enough

name: drow_arc_thanks_05
text: I hope your help will be enough.
text_simple: i hope your help will be enough

name: drow_arc_water_03
text: I should have more of this each day.
text_simple: i should have more of this each day

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_01
text: Act like you've been there before.
text_simple: act like youve been there before

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_02
text: A loud mouth betrays a lack of skill.
text_simple: a loud mouth betrays a lack of skill

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_03
text: I should have stayed with the Drow...
text_simple: i should have stayed with the drow

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_04
text: This is why I hate people.
text_simple: this is why i hate people

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_05
text: Skip the banter and get back to work.
text_simple: skip the banter and get back to work

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_06
text: Time to put dark thoughts to action.
text_simple: time to put dark thoughts to action

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_07
text: There's only one way to see behind the eyes.
text_simple: theres only one way to see behind the eyes

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_09
text: The world doesn't answer to you.
text_simple: the world doesnt answer to you

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_10
text: Now my problems are your problems.
text_simple: now my problems are your problems

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_11
text: You were focused on the wrong threat.
text_simple: you were focused on the wrong threat

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_12
text: How could you let me do this?
text_simple: how could you let me do this

name: drow_arc_wheel_all_14
text: At least you left behind a beautiful corpse.
text_simple: at least you left behind a beautiful corpse

name: drow_arc_wheel_deny_01
text: I'm not here to waste words on you.

text: I don't see your point. Wanna see mine?

text: As you can see, I disagree.

name: drow_arc_win_03
text: The world will drown for my bloodthirst.
